title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah’s Terror Infrastructure in Al-Adaysseh, Southern Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah’s terror infrastructures in the region of Al-Adaysseh in southern Lebanon

A short while ago, fighter jets of the Air Force attacked a terror infrastructure, an observation post and a launch post of the Hezbollah terror organization in the region of Al-Adaysseh in southern Lebanon. Over the course of the night, an IDF tank fired to remove a threat in the Mount Dov area.

In response to the alert about the intrusion of an enemy aircraft in the north, a missile was launched following a false identification. In the recent hours, two launches from Lebanon to Israel were identified, the IDF attacked the sources of the fire, no casualties.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/424b5Vu
